questions.question:
When was the Vrije Universiteit Brussel 
 (VUB) founded?

What is the official language of 
 instruction at VUB?

Which faculty at VUB specializes in 
 engineering and technology?
options: Faculty of Science and Bioengineering Sciences

questions.question:
In which municipality of Brussels is the 
main campus of VUB located?

Which Nobel laureate is associated 
 with VUB?

What is the name of VUB's largest 
 library?

Which Belgian royal family member is a 
 notable alumna of VUB?

VUB is known for its active student 
 community. What is the name of its student union?

Which Nobel Prize did Jules 
 Bordet win?
options: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine
questions.correct_answer: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine

questions.question:
Which international exchange program 
 allows VUB students to study abroad?

What is the name of VUB's football 
 team?

Which prominent scientist served as the 
 rector of VUB from 1986 to 1989?

What is the name of VUB's official 
 student newspaper?

Which renowned Belgian architect designed 
 some of the buildings on VUB's campus?

In which year did VUB establish the 
 Brussels Photonics Team, a research group 
 focused on photonics?
